Title: Clarifies the qualification to receive an absentee ballot and clarifies the process for delivery of an absentee ballot
Summary: Clarifies the qualification to receive an absentee ballot; clarifies the process for delivery of an absentee ballot.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to clarifying the qualification to receive an absentee ballot and clarifying the process for delivery of an absentee ballot
